summary: Routing of speakers to TTS engine selections.

top_level_symbols.name: CastDecision
top_level_symbols.doc:
Final TTS selection for a speaker. Attributes:
    speaker: Original speaker query.

top_level_symbols.name: merge_style
top_level_symbols.doc:
Merge style overrides onto ``base``. Args:
    base: Base style dataclass.

top_level_symbols.name: pick_voice
top_level_symbols.doc:
Choose engine, voice and style for ``speaker_name``. Args:
    cfg: Loaded profile configuration.
